id.description: The unique identifier of the attestation.

dateCreated.description: Created date/time of the attestation in ISO format.

dateTransferred.description: Transferred date/time of the attestation in ISO format, can be blank if holder identity is owner.

holderIdentity.description: The identity of the current holder, can be undefined if owner is still the holder.

proof.description: The proof for the attested data.

verified.description: Whether the attestation has been verified.
